content:
{
  "version": "0.2.3",
  "license": "MIT",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "typings": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "src"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "tsconfig",
    "paths",
    "webpack",
    "alias",
    "monorepo"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "start": "tsdx watch",
    "build": "tsdx build",
    "test": "tsdx test --ci --coverage",
    "lint": "tsdx lint",
    "prepublishOnly": "tsdx build",
    "size": "size-limit",
    "analyze": "size-limit --why"
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "tsdx lint"
    }
  },
  "prettier": {
    "printWidth": 80,
    "semi": true,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "trailingComma": "es5"
  },
  "name": "enhanced-tsconfig-paths-webpack-plugin",
  "description": "Load modules according to the closest tsconfig.json's paths in webpack, working greatly in Monorepo",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/wre232114/enhanced-tsconfig-paths-webpack-plugin"
  },
  "author": "wre232114",
  "module": "dist/enhanced-tsconfig-paths-webpack-plugin.esm.js",
  "size-limit": [
    {
      "path": "dist/enhanced-tsconfig-paths-webpack-plugin.cjs.production.min.js",
      "limit": "10 KB"
    },
    {
      "path": "dist/enhanced-tsconfig-paths-webpack-plugin.esm.js",
      "limit": "10 KB"
    }
  ],
  "devDependencies": {
    "@size-limit/preset-small-lib": "^5.0.2",
    "@types/enhanced-resolve": "^3.0.7",
    "@types/node": "^16.6.1",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^4.28.5",
    "enhanced-resolve": "^5.8.2",
    "eslint": "^7.31.0",
    "husky": "^7.0.1",
    "prettier": "^2.3.2",
    "prettier-eslint": "^13.0.0",
    "size-limit": "^5.0.2",
    "ts-loader": "^9.2.5",
    "ts-node": "^10.2.0",
    "tsdx": "^0.14.1",
    "tslib": "^2.3.0",
    "typescript": "^4.3.5",
    "webpack": "^5.50.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^4.7.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "tsconfig-paths": "^3.10.1"
  }
}
